definition: affair/business/matter/to be engaged in/to attend to/by all means
high ranking official (old)/term of endearment between spouses (old)/(from the Tang Dynasty onwards) term used by the emperor for his subjects (old)/honorific (old)

sentences.english: He gave Powell secretary of state and then began to box him up.
sentences.chinese: 他給了鮑威爾國務卿的位子，然後開始捆住他的手腳。

sentences.english: Secretary of State Condoleezza Rice squeezed in some ice time while in Russia.
sentences.chinese: 在俄羅斯美國國務卿賴斯擠出一些時間在冰場上。

sentences.english: In July, Secretary of State Hillary Rodham Clinton challenged China over its claims to wide areas of the South China Sea.
sentences.chinese: 七月，國務卿希拉蕊挑戰南海主權上挑戰中國。

sentences.english: Secretary of State Hillary Rodham Clinton said he presided over a " narco- state."
sentences.chinese: 國務卿希拉里說卡爾扎伊管理的是一個“毒品國家”。

sentences.english: At the close of World War II, Acheson was serving as Under Secretary of State.
sentences.chinese: 在二戰接近尾聲時，艾奇遜擔任副國務卿。

sentences.english: The secretary of state also traveled this week. She began an eleven-day trip to Africa.
sentences.chinese: 美國國務卿這周也開展了對非洲爲期11天的訪問。

sentences.english: The Secretary of State might well be there.
Quite the contrary, she seems intent on making history as Secretary of State.
sentences.chinese: 恰恰相反，她似乎一心想以國務卿身份而永載史冊。

sentences.english: Secretary Clinton talks about the pre-Mona days.
sentences.chinese: 克林頓國務卿談到我遇到蒙娜之前的日子。

sentences.english: In 1844 Calhoun became Secretary of State.
What's the big deal about Grandma Maddy being Secretary of State?
sentences.chinese: 奶奶做過國務卿，有什麼了不起嗎？

sentences.english: Former secretary of state Lawrence Eagleburger says the international community must act forcefully with North Korea.
sentences.chinese: 前美國國務卿伊格爾伯格表示，國際社會對北韓行動。

sentences.english: The President designated Mr.Sharp as the next Secretary of State.
sentences.chinese: 總統任命夏普先生爲下任國務卿。

sentences.english: First of all, Secretary Clinton dosen't wanna use a couple of words.
sentences.chinese: 首先，前國務卿希拉里同志不想用幾個特定的詞。

sentences.english: Secretary of State Condoleezza Rice - who canceled foreign travel plans - is leading U.S. diplomatic efforts.
sentences.chinese: 國務卿賴斯取消出國訪問，她正領導美國的外交努力。

sentences.english: Accompanying the peripatetic Secretary of State on his shuttle diplomacy marathons.
sentences.chinese: 伴隨四處奔走的國務卿於穿梭外交的馬拉松旅途上。

definition: Angela Merkel (1954-), German CDU politician, chancellor from 2005
member of the US House of Representatives
chair (or president, speaker etc) of national congress
François Hollande (1954-), French Socialist politician, president of France 2012-2017
